alert.note: Alert for Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 6:55PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Iron County through 730 PM CDT... At 655 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mercer, or 10 miles northeast of Turtle Flambeau Flowage, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Iron County, including the following locations... Manitowish, Fisher Lake and Long Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
